==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しゅう|にゅう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|収|sc=Jpan}} (''shū'', "take possesion of") + {{m|ja|入|sc=Jpan}} (''nyū'', "enter," "go in," "come in")

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しゅうにゅう|kyu=收入}}

# [[income]], [[earnings]], [[receipts]]

====Derived terms====
{{top2}}
* [[収入源]] (''shūnyūgen''): source of income
* [[収入役]] (''shūnyūyaku''): government treasurer
* [[収入印紙]] (''shūnyū inshi''): revenue stamp
* [[収入関税]] (''shūnyū kanzei''): revenue tariff
* [[収入機会]] (''shūnyū kikai''): revenue opportunity
* [[収入金額]] (''shūnyū kingaku''): total receipts, income amount
* [[高収入]] (''kōshūnyū''): high income
* [[雑収入]] (''zatsushūnyū'', ''zasshūnyū''): miscellaneous income
* [[純収入]] (''junshūnyū''): net revenue
* [[税収入]] (''zeishūnyū''): tax revenue, tax revenues
{{mid2}}
* [[総収入]] (''sōshūnyū''): total income
* [[定収入]] (''teishūnyū''): fixed income
* [[副収入]] (''fukushūnyū''): additional income
* [[帰属収入]] (''kizoku shūnyū''): imputed income
* [[限界収入]] (''genkai shūnyū''): marginal revenue
* [[現金収入]] (''genkin shūnyū''): having a cash income
* [[興行収入]] (''kōgyō shūnyū''): box-office takings, box-office revenue
* [[広告収入]] (''kōkoku shūnyū''): advertising revenue
* [[特許収入]] (''tokkyo shūnyū''): patent income
